gitdoc.ai.customInstructions: Generate a commit message in English following the Conventional Commits specification and `commitlint` rules. Use the format `<type>(<scope>): <short description>` and choose `<type>` from `build`, `ci`, `docs`, `feat`, `fix`, `perf`, `chore`, `refactor`, `revert`, `format`, `test`. Limit `<short description>` to 72 characters. If `<short description>` starts with an English word, it must be in lowercase, scope must not be longer than 16 characters.
